Package pl.lejczak.project

Interface SortingFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BubbleSort, InsertionSort
    public interface SortingFactory
    Creates products, which are sorting algorithms. Needs sorting structure as the component.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Maciej Lejczak

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Structure createStructure()
      Data structure component creator.
      ArrayList<Integer> getData()
      Getter of array.
      String getName()
      Getter of algorithm name.
      boolean isSorted()
      Getter of information about sorting status.

      Setter of data structure.
      void sort()
      Sorting algorithm implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • createStructure

        Structure createStructure()
        Data structure component creator. Creates the appropriate data structure for the sorting algorithm.
        Returns:
        structure to be used in the sorting algorithm.

      • sort

        void sort()
        Sorting algorithm implementation. After any reordering in the structure, it returns to controller.

      • setData

        void setData​(ArrayList<Integer> data)
        Setter of data structure.
        Parameters:
        data - array to be transferred to data structure

      • getData

        ArrayList<Integer> getData()
                    throws EmptyDataException
        Getter of array.
        Returns:
        array
        Throws:
        EmptyDataException - Thrown when blank data detected.

      • isSorted

        boolean isSorted()
        Getter of information about sorting status.
        Returns:
        information whether the sorting algorithm has completed all iterations

      • getName

        String getName()
        Getter of algorithm name.
        Returns:
        name of algorithm
